data.app_name: The Pirate Queen with Lucy Liu
data.description:
Embark on an epic journey through the turbulent waters of history in "The Pirate Queen", with Lucy Liu üåü

![{"height":224,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982662_7513468888773292_7586277367396825871_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=hl02YaTA_y4Q7kNvgH8cmFy&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFYUfE5XjmPZ3wQU7CNTqxiKiFDR2m-i1uxOIfQ8MuIw&oe=66531D9C)

Step into the boots of the legendary pirate Cheng Shih and see if you have what it takes to become history's most powerful pirate  üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏è


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39036653_1456869748359051_7076517034930849202_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=8hHtLiG4At0Q7kNvgGyX6-r&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBFPQ68nZ9-LxJDTRa1JJP_BaHmN_6US9AjDtGUyeA_hg&oe=66532724)


Travel back in time with this immersive story, perfect for explorers of all ages. Whether you're seeking a fresh adventure, yearning to escape into another world, or eager to unearth a hidden gem from history, this legend is for you.

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003263_961033948683270_8273646164126363713_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=PKGaTAh49DIQ7kNvgGZnPgR&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAw8HTdnYEnpLgXyY6PPlcBO_4Y9nZ7iuOsInJxIji5Yw&oe=66530E87)

With light gameplay elements, the focus is on the narrative. Dive into a story-rich experience lasting 1-4 hours ‚è≥, climb rigging, explore moonlit cabins üåô, unearth hidden artefacts, and exercise your wit to become leader of the Red Flag Fleet.  

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031579_801519894943640_3850714342256227051_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nzgeD2F5DusQ7kNvgEJt6qH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCPi55-8FnZhB3aWDyUnYVoAAjB_C-Dy4tB28SsEIP6sQ&oe=66530166)

![{"height":231,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031400_1653444588750690_8451663376835143463_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=_w_bTIprLJYQ7kNvgENmYrT&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDSRN0ZMFyW3BNz2P_fjfjCTIMeGMqsSUuBilm_l_Yj2Q&oe=66532DD8)

Celebrated for its cinematic story and historical environments, this non-combat experience has earned critical acclaim, winning the Tribeca Storyscapes Award (2023) & the Raindance Discovery Award (2021) üèÜ

![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75322595_315227141608157_6664541123259039926_n.png?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=fIhejNqicrYQ7kNvgGRevie&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBt3uiecqki8fRqlPV1zhMSDggwdGliiz_eDZRwadyyrA&oe=66532A59)


![{"height":225,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974820_419365674368364_6471370540204954427_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=k2rYbuTTMa0Q7kNvgHOo2ip&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC22d0RW21A2WA3GoO_FgFE3cwGhTNxpPbpEtjJrl8RHQ&oe=66531070)

Experience the captivating performance from Hollywood actress Lucy Liu üé≠, who brings Cheng Shih's character to life, under the direction of critically acclaimed filmmaker and creative director Eloise Singer üé¨


![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/57569455_779145490949371_5639970595016054333_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=EhUCFb0M00cQ7kNvgFfULdQ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYClplxCHsFwCyKNFD3bpOM2S3blXaT-9ZebBzN8DHge3Q&oe=6652FAEA)

![{"height":244,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75593949_1392764491611640_7662168618929982906_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=m0pi6iAu7T4Q7kNvgGjQlqH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBB68ibNCdkSId0gzKDiA4mAxTCOYL1ZKj8w0WqmogbiA&oe=66530E97)

Are you ready to turn the tides of history? Let's see how well you fare as The Pirate Queen! üè¥‚Äç‚ò†Ô∏èüëë



![{"height":910,"type":"image","width":1559}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75251817_478868781249664_4666816330504461518_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=J075F5UrvNEQ7kNvgErLB-c&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA7qMSyqQ4zCIg6x-Qww2I_FGCwNMWTyUFvahypx6zaSg&oe=66532A0C)
